701023f-a.title: Bronx: Exterior Street - 230th Street (West)
701023f-a.text:
Exterior Street, between West 230th Street and West Kingsbridge
Road. The view is in a southwesterly direction, showing W.P.A. men
working on a sewer project. Im the center background is visible the
Webb Academy;on the extreme right is the Hall of Fame of New York
University,and in the left background is the .S. 'eterans Hospital.
April 27, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
